events.Raise Water Level:
(is_adult and (Hookshot or Hover_Boots or Bow or can_mega)) or
                ((has_fire_source_with_torch or can_gdv) and can_use_projectile) or
                (is_child and can_hover)

locations.Water Temple Main Room L2 Pot 1:
at('Water Temple Lowered Water', True) or can_use(Boomerang) or
                ((can_use(Iron_Boots) or (Progressive_Scale, 2)) and
                    (can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Slingshot)) and
                    (can_use(Zora_Tunic) or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements))
locations.Water Temple Main Room L2 Pot 2:
at('Water Temple Lowered Water', True) or can_use(Boomerang) or
                ((can_use(Iron_Boots) or (Progressive_Scale, 2)) and
                    (can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Slingshot)) and
                    (can_use(Zora_Tunic) or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements))

exits.Water Temple East Column:
(glitch_navi_dive and can_jumpslash) or
                (
                is_adult and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements) and
                ((logic_water_temple_torch_longshot and Longshot) or Iron_Boots)
                )
exits.Water Temple Compass Room:
is_adult and Iron_Boots and
                (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements) and Hookshot
exits.Water Temple Before Boss:
can_use(Longshot) or
                (adv_hovers_recoil and can_use(Hover_Boots) and Megaton_Hammer) or
                ((can_mega or can_hess or can_superslide) and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                can_hover
exits.Water Temple North Basement:
can_use(Iron_Boots) and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)
                and (Longshot or (logic_water_north_basement and Hover_Boots) or can_hover)
                and (Small_Key_Water_Temple, 4)

exits.Morpha Boss Room:
Boss_Key_Water_Temple or
                (can_isg and can_take_damage and (
                    (glitch_water_bk_skip_bombs and Bombs) or
                    (glitch_water_bk_skip_chus and has_bombchus)
                ))

exits.Water Temple Middle South Block:
Iron_Boots and Hookshot and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)
                and glitch_underwater_chests
exits.Water Temple North Basement:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 4)
                and (
                (glitch_water_bk_area_antigrav and can_live_dmg(0.5))
                or (Longshot or (logic_water_north_basement and Hover_Boots) or can_hover)
                )

locations.Water Temple Map Chest:
has_soul(Spike_Enemy) and Raise_Water_Level and
                (is_adult or Sticks or has_explosives or can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_use(Megaton_Hammer))
locations.Water Temple Cracked Wall Chest:
(is_adult and Iron_Boots and Hookshot and
                (has_bombchus or glitch_clipping)) or
                (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and has_explosives and
                    (
                    (logic_water_cracked_wall_hovers and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                    (logic_water_cracked_wall_nothing)
                    )
                ) or
                at('Water Temple Lowered Water', (((Small_Key_Water_Temple,5) and can_use(Hookshot)) or
                    has_fire_source_with_torch or can_use(Sticks) or can_use(Bow) or can_gdv) and
                    has_explosives and (can_use(Iron_Boots) or (Progressive_Scale, 2)))

locations.Water Temple Torches Chest:
has_soul(Shell_Blade) and
                (Bow or can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_gdv or
                    (Child_Water_Temple and Sticks and Kokiri_Sword and Magic_Meter))
locations.Water Temple GS Central Pillar:
at('Water Temple Lobby',is_adult and Hookshot and Zora_Tunic and Iron_Boots and glitch_water_central_pillar_with_torch_clip
                    and (Small_Key_Water_Temple,5)) or
                ((Longshot or (logic_water_central_gs_fw and Hookshot and can_use(Farores_Wind))) and
                    ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5) or Bow or (is_adult and can_use(Sticks)) or can_use(Dins_Fire)
                    or can_gdv)) or
                (logic_water_central_gs_irons and Hookshot and Iron_Boots and
                    (Bow or can_use(Dins_Fire) or (is_adult and can_use(Sticks)) or can_gdv)) or
                (logic_water_central_gs_fw and Child_Water_Temple and Boomerang and can_use(Farores_Wind) and
                    Raise_Water_Level and ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5) or Sticks or can_use(Dins_Fire)))

exits.Water Temple Near Below Central Pillar: (Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5) or has_fire_source_with_torch or can_gdv or can_use(Bow)
exits.Water Temple North Basement:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 4) and
                (Longshot or (logic_water_north_basement and Hover_Boots) or can_hover)
exits.Water Temple Dragon Head Room:
(can_use(Hookshot) and glitch_water_torch_clip)
                or (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and
                    (is_adult or can_child_attack)
                )

locations.Water Temple Behind Gate Pot 1:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                (adv_damage_boost and is_adult and Bombs and can_live_dmg(0.5,False,False))
locations.Water Temple Behind Gate Pot 2:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                (adv_damage_boost and is_adult and Bombs and can_live_dmg(0.5,False,False))
locations.Water Temple Behind Gate Pot 3:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                (adv_damage_boost and is_adult and Bombs and can_live_dmg(0.5,False,False))
locations.Water Temple Behind Gate Pot 4:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                (adv_damage_boost and is_adult and Bombs and can_live_dmg(0.5,False,False))
locations.Water Temple GS Behind Gate:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                (adv_damage_boost and is_adult and Bombs and can_live_dmg(0.5,False,False))

region_name: Water Temple Near Below Central Pillar

locations.Water Temple Central Pillar Chest:
(has_soul(Spike_Enemy) and has_soul(Shell_Blade) and is_adult and Iron_Boots and Zora_Tunic and Hookshot)
                or (glitch_ledge_clip and is_adult and ((can_shield and has_explosives) or Megaton_Hammer))

exits.Water Temple 3 Water Spouts Room:
(is_adult and logic_water_north_basement_ledge_jump) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                (has_explosives and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)

region_name: Water Temple Boss Key Chest Room

locations.Water Temple Dragon Chest:
at('Water Temple River Chest Hallway',
                (logic_water_dragon_jump_dive and (can_use(Bow) or can_use(Longshot) or can_use(Slingshot)))
                or (is_adult and glitch_ledge_clip))
                or
                (is_child and (Slingshot or has_bombchus or Boomerang) and (logic_water_dragon_child or glitch_water_dragon_cs_dive))
                or
                (is_adult and (Bow or has_bombchus or can_use(Boomerang) or Hookshot) and (logic_water_dragon_adult or glitch_water_dragon_cs_dive))

locations.Water Temple GS Falling Platform Room:
can_use(Longshot) or
                (logic_water_falling_platform_gs_hookshot and can_use(Hookshot)) or
                (logic_water_falling_platform_gs_boomerang and can_use(Boomerang))

locations.Water Temple GS River:
(Iron_Boots and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)) or
                (logic_water_river_gs and Longshot and (Bow or has_bombchus))
